scripts.build-js: mkdir -p dist/js && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify src/js/index.js -o dist/js/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.build-fonts: mkdir -p dist/fonts && cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/* dist/fonts && cp -r node_modules/bootstrap-less/fonts/* dist/fonts
scripts.build-all: npm run build-html && npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run build-fonts
scripts.clean-all: npm run clean-html && npm run clean-js && npm run clean-css && npm run clean-fonts
scripts.watch-all: npm run watch-html & npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css
scripts.develop: npm run clean-all && npm run build-all && npm run watch-all & npm run devserver
